WWWOFFLE - World Wide Web Offline Explorer

WWWOFFLE Host Not Got

Your request for the $url?{URL}{host}
$url?{%decode[url]}{$host}
failed $reason?{$reason}{because it is on the list of hosts and/or paths that are not to be fetched.}

Help

The WWWOFFLE proxy server has been configured so that requests for this URL are not allowed. This is controlled by the DontGet section of the wwwoffle.conf configuration file. The configuration file contains information about how to specify hosts that are not to be got.
